casebody.data:
In the Matter of Mary E. JACOBI, Appellant,
v.
TAX APPEALS TRIBUNAL of the State of New York et al., Respondents. 2018-231 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 3, 2018

***1062On the Court's own motion, appeal dismissed, without costs, upon the ground that no substantial constitutional question is directly involved. Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
